entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 12 except minus 16 inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12 except minus 16 inland. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
